content.title: RHSA-2023:1279: Synopsis: Red Hat OpenStack Platform (openstack-cinder) security update (Important)
content.description:
Cinder is the replacement of nova-volume in Folsom and beyond, used for
block storage.

Security Fix(es):

* Arbitrary file access through custom VMDK flat descriptor
(CVE-2022-47951)

For more details about the security issue(s), including the impact, a CVSS
score, acknowledgments, and other related information, refer to the CVE
page listed in the References section.
